properties.name: melissabatch.service.base
properties.description: The base of the URL for the MelissaData Personator service

properties.name: melissabatch.options
properties.description: MelissaData Options parameter. See MelissaData documentation for Personator Service.

properties.name: melissabatch.actions
properties.description: MelissaData Actions parameter. See MelissaData documentation for Personator Service.

properties.name: melissabatch.columns
properties.description: MelissaData Columns parameter. See MelissaData documentation for Personator Service.

properties.name: melissabatch.batch.timer
properties.description: This is the delay or backpressure value. This is milliseconds of time before the service checks if a batch is available to send.

properties.name: melissabatch.batch.size
properties.description: MelissaData maximum size for a batch. See MelissaData documentation for Personator Service.

properties.name: melissabatch.batch.cacheTimeOut
properties.description: Not to be confused with the batch timer or backpressure; this is how long it takes to timeout while trying to offer a new record to the in-memory queue that has reached its capacity.

properties.name: melissabatch.batch.cache
properties.description: How many records can be enqueued before the callers are waiting to offer new records.s

properties.name: melissabatch.connection.timeout
properties.description: How long to wait before expiring the connection.

properties.name: melissabatch.connection.retry
properties.description: The number of times to retry a fail connection.
